website_summaries.verdict: Powerful and precise trimmer with a multitude of accessories for grooming eyebrows, nose, and ear hair.
pros: Stands out for its ergonomic soft grip handle
Precision blades designed to cut and not pull hair
Water resistant and easy to clean after use
Comes with carry pouch and brush
cons: Accessories and parts not available separately
If the blades dull or an accessory is lost then a full kit has to be bought

customer_reviews.title: Nice device. Very Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: i bought one of the trimmers a few months back. I was pleased but, it stopped working within a short period of time. Giving the manufacturer the benefit of the doubt I purchased a second one. Again, I was pleased but, it also stopped working in very short order. The mechanism that engages with the battery when you twist the shaft broke for a second time. So... a nice functional device. Not a problem if you don't mind replacing it every very few weeks. Don't buy. Phillips quality control is M.I.A.
customer_reviews.author: ChefBoy RD

customer_reviews.title: Philips Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. Philips quality has gone south the past few years. Constantly have to go over the same spots and trying to trim eye brows is like trying to take down a tree with a pocket knife. It nicks the hairs but doesn’t go through them and I don’t have thick bushy ones by any means. I regret the purchase, save yourself the money and nerves.
customer_reviews.author: NYCeGURU

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first, but quickly found I prefer the nose trimmer blades that are perpendicular to the head. These really don’t trim well and leave behind a lot of nose hairs. Also the beard trimmer attachment doesn’t cut well, grabs hair a lot, and has always nicked my face. This one isn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Faulk

customer_reviews.title: Device Not Powering On
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use the device without no issues for a few months. Afterwards, the device would no longer power on. I tried using several new batteries, but the device would still not work. I own a Philips Norelco beard trimmer and it is a great product. I purchased this nose trimmer expecting the same results, but was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jey C

customer_reviews.title: Not Nirvana
customer_reviews.text: I read a LOT of reviews for this product before purchasing. I think for the money, it's a pretty good deal. But it's one of those deals where I would have paid more to get a better product like it. I'm not big on stepping over dollars to pick up pennies. I cannot get it to trim nose hairs efficiently. And it's not that great at trimming all the ear hair as well. You have to work at it with many passes & twists. The ON/OFF switch feels cheap, as in breaking in the near feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: A PIECE OF JUNK NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Norelco NT5175/42 back near the end of 2017, went out in January of 2020. I used it once a week, ok I got 3 years off it. So when it went out even after light use, I decided to give it another try. What a MISTAKE!!!!!!!! It's March 18 2020, and it went out. I bought this at the end of January the 28th to be exact, again after using it once a week with light service I only got about 48 days which translates to actually 12 times of use. What a piece of JUNK. Don't buy find something else. A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Werner Voss

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: (Note: I am female) I bought this mainly for the nose hair trimmer, but I like the trimmer to clip my sideburns and over my ears, too. You have to spend at least 2-3 minutes on each nostril to get all the hair down to the skin. I have to stick it pretty far up. It tickles a lot so gets the mucus running for me. Make sure you clean the trimmer very well after use, or the hair and mucus drying up inside the trimmer head will make it not function. Read the directions, people! It's pretty small, has no cord, and is lightweight - everything I wanted in a trimmer. Love it and love breathing much easier!
customer_reviews.author: mfskarphedin

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimming Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this as I needed a new nose hair / ear hair trimmer. But stuck at home during the COVID-19 pandemic, the accessories in this kit have been pressed into serviced as a more general purpose trimmer. We have pushed the envelope of intended uses for this product to trim eyebrows, sideburns, and generally clean up the hair on the back of my neck and around my ears in the absence of the ability to get a normal haircut. It has worked surprisingly well! I know it won't last forever, but it is cheap enough that I won't mind having to update it periodically. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Broken After a Year
customer_reviews.text: My experience with Philips is that they are all about form instead of function. Every Philips product that I have bought or received has broken within a year and was not repairable. This nose hair trimmer is no different. The oscillating blade started grinding and finally just quit working.
customer_reviews.author: B. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Trims but very difficult and time consuming
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this product because it had good reviews overall. The product works but it is very difficult to trim the nose hairs. You have to keep moving it around more than I thought you would. In fact, it took about 10 minutes to accomplish this task when a tweezer would have been faster. The Philips doesn't cut as well as I thought. I can't recommend something that makes a task more difficult. I normally have good luck with Philips products but this one is a pass.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schurley

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: I like my unit a lot and use it often. The only reason o gave it 3 stars is my particular unit has a funny torsional effect—for lack of better description on my part: at times whatever attachment I’m using slows down a lot as if it’s under load, even when it’s very clean, and so I have to put sideways pressure (when viewed top to bottom) to get the unit to spin more freely. It’s been this way since new. My brother has the same unit and his doesn’t do this. Not quite debilitating enough for me to have gone through the trouble of returning it simply because the unit is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: The Fishers

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift for Hubbs
customer_reviews.text: Hubbs likes it. That's saying alot. He's a no frill blue collar type. He likes quality, simplicity and is a clean freak. So this is great. He keeps his mustache, beard and brows [& clearing throat here looking around ear hairs] well groomed. He can water rinse this in the sink and does not worry about anything remaining on the blade. The small bag is grey and acceptable to keep everything in - the brown groomer guard, beard guard and such. Good buy had this a little over a month. Good buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I'd leave NO stars if I could. My wife purchased this for me as a Christmas present and when I finally got to use it on Christmas day it didn't work. Well... to be honest I put the included cheap battery in and it ran for about 30 seconds and died so I put a fresh Duracell in and it still will not run. Unfortunately since it was purchased so long ago it's past the return point so I'll have to just throw it in the trash and I'm out for buying another piece of junk Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: R. DoBosh

customer_reviews.title: Norelco Philips personal groomer NT5175
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Norelco personal groomer to replace a previous gift. It accidentally fell on the ground and the personal groomer fell apart. What I like about this groomer is it's battery operated so I can use rechargeables. And it makes it much easier not having to travel around with the charger unit. Also, I like the head design on this since long and narrow to get into the nostril. Also having two sizes for eyebrow grooming is a Plus.
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: ... working for no apparent reason after 2 uses don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: item stopped working for no apparent reason after 2 uses don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: wyatt

customer_reviews.title: If its Norelco it's always a good product
customer_reviews.text: Because of the shape of my nose I use this trimmer to trim off the ugly nose hair. This trimmer gets into the corners of my nose better than the rotating nose trimmer (although I have to use a rotating nose trimmer for deep long hairs). Norelco has always made good products. There are guys that I have seen who should use this product (there are some noses that have vines in there noses).
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hero

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally happy with the way these trimmers perform..powerful and im still using the same battery that it came with when I purchased it 2 months ago..the cutting blades are sharp and the attachments work well...the only thing I think I will do is buy some extra beard trimmer attachments bc it only comes with one length for that....every thing it came with works great I just like to have more options but that's personal preference...these are definitely worth purchasing if you are looking for trimmers. Well worth the money no issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan irwin

customer_reviews.title: not complete
customer_reviews.text: i returned the fist one, because it did not have blade cover! i was told that, the second one will absolutely will have one it did not!!!!!!!!!!!!!! even though it shows on the packaging that it does !!!!!!!!!!!! the only reason i would like a cover is because the blade might get damaged rolling a round in the drawer with other things. come to find out norelco or philips does not even have covers for that model in their inventory!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! so, SOL
customer_reviews.author: Tibor Mistok

customer_reviews.title: It works the way it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I read some people complaining about it cutting them but I've had no problems with it. I'm a hairy guy and have to trim my nose and ear hairs a couple of times a week to avoid looking like an old potatoe. I'd buy it again, but I hope that's in 3-4 years or more
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Waste of Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband after reading all the great reviews & high rating. It was used exactly twice and then, when he tried to use it the third time, nothing happened. He changed the batteries but still nothing. Of course this happened after 30 days so Amazon wouldn't replace.
customer_reviews.author: drhae

customer_reviews.title: Great for above the waist shaving!
customer_reviews.text: Great clippers to clean up beards, neck hair, chest, and eyes brows. Blades are sharp and provide a close shave. I would NOT use this below the waist. The blades are a little large and mutilate any low hanging fruit if you know what I mean. I did and immediately regretted my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W.

customer_reviews.title: Weird shape
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this to trim nose and ear hairs must not have tried it after the design. I find that it does a poor job. The on off switch is even strange from my point of view. I would not recommend it. I prefer the older style of nose hair trimmer that does not have the trimmer blade on one side of the insert.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great grooming kit!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A great grooming kit that is easy to clean, does what it says, and doesn't mangle my nose or skin and hurt me. I'm surprised how well this works. It's a great hair trimmer. It washes like it says and so far, I've been very happy with it. I recommend it over the other one's I've researched out there, and think this is the best value and overall performer.
customer_reviews.author: NJD & DMD

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as the previous model
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, fast shipping, reasonably priced. This item does a good job of cutting hairs and not pulling hairs. I bought the previous model and liked it so much I bought a replacement when it finally stopped working. This model is adequate, but the power is reduced. it doesn't flow or vent water as efficiently when washing. The attachments are great for manscaping and trimming.
customer_reviews.author: sci f.

customer_reviews.title: Stop using your nose hair for a "comb-over mustache"!
customer_reviews.text: The wife made me buy this. She said my eyebrows getting tangled in my hair and nose hair wasn't working. I was injured by my old 'roto-plucker' when it caught on the cables in my schnoz and shorted out in a burst of flame. My chain saw needed a new blade anyway, so I gave this a try. Now I can't keep the women away! Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: ren

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product twice. 1st one did not work. Assembled with battery installed and it was inconsistent. Had to play with the on and off for it to turn on. I figured let me order another one. Cheap enough to not bother with return. Now I’m beyond upset to put it nicely. This one doesn’t run at all. Battery installed correctly and I’m sure the product is defective. I suggest you pull all from stock and test or scrap. Recommend your supplier does proper testing prior to shipping. Waste of my time. Thank you for your time. I’m not a return type of customer , I expect quality On every purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fv

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: This thing was, frankly, a complete waste of money. The biggest problem is that it doesn't seem to work that well, sometimes requiring 15-20 passes to remove a handful of hairs. The rotary style seems to work better than this style. I tried it for about a month and then tossed it into the goodwill pile (I wonder if people buy this sort of thing second hand?)
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: It actually works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Like many items you buy online, sight unseen, I was pretty sceptical about the quality and usefulness of this item. I was pleasantly surprised, how well it is made and how well it works! The fact is, after you hit fifty years of age, hair starts to grow evwrywhere!! For your nose, eyebrows and even your mustache, this little clipper does an admirable job. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer works well, but doesn't last. After 5 months of minimal use, once or twice a week, it just stopped working. Philips quality has gone down the toilet. My previous Philips trimmer is 6 years old and still works. The only problem with that one is I can't get new blades or combs for it. I won't be buying another Philips.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Robrecht

customer_reviews.title: Like a chainsaw for nose hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Gets rid of the armpit sticking out of the side of your head. Has a nice attachment for your eyebrows. Trims them up nice. No more unsightly hair hanging out of my nose! Have you noticed the guy at work with that 3 inch hair hanging out his nose? Makes you want to reach up and pull it out. Don't be that guy, get this trimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Martin G.

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Sept 18, 2018, and it's dead September 8, 2019. When it worked, it was good. My only complaint is that if my hands were wet, it was difficult to turn on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Salerno

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love this trimmer! I was skeptical to say the least, but it works great! It doesn't pull or cut, and its operation is smooth and I think that it's so smart that you can just run it under the sink to clean it! I hate nose hair and I'm glad that I spent the money on this trimmer. The eyebrow trimmer guards are great, I tried them out too they just trim the wild hairs and keep everything neat.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Small but packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact, several useful attachments, easy to use. I bought this to replace the manual nose trimmer I normally use and the beard/neck trimmer that suddenly stopped working a few weeks earlier. This small device does it all. Ear, nose, beard, and neck. Powerful device. It cuts well without pulling hair. Easy to clean. Just run it under water for a few seconds. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: austxbot

customer_reviews.title: The best trimming experience I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only trimmer I have used which does not pull the hairs as it trims. You may have to go over an area a few times to complete the trim, but not once have I had a hair pulled instead of cut, so in my view, this trimmers blade design is very good. I use it mainly for nose and ears, but have also used it for eyebrows, and it is equally good for that area.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Francis Daly

customer_reviews.title: The only nose hair trimmer that has ever worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a nose hair trimmer that actually worked until now. This seems to be the only model of its type as far as I could find. The spinner-type nose hair clippers have never worked for me. I used to use scissors but this gadget is way better. For ear hairs, my regular buzz clippers work ok but this gadget is better for that too. I will say, this thing is NG for eyebrow hair though - I'll stick with the regular clippers for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lycans or Yeti who need frequent nose and ear trimming!
customer_reviews.text: I really get tired of buying a new nose hair trimmer, or ear hair trimmer, every 1-2 years because the cheap motors burn out. I can't help being a Yeti or part Lycan twice removed on my maternal grandfather's side of the family! I picked one of these up with low expectations and found it works tremendously. It works so well, that I can out into public and most people don't realize I'm part Yeti or Lycan. I use this daily, and have had zero issues for months -- and the battery last a long time as well. Easy to clean, and many of the accessories only add to the value. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this product. I husband seems to have miss placed it somewhere in the house. We ordered the same one, which he has had for a few years already. He loves all the accessories that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Battery last for a very long time comes with a lot of useful accessories. Doesn’t pull or tug on nose hair as it’s cutting it . I find I have to make several passes to get it to cut my nose hairs . It cuts some easily others I have to make several attempts. Does a better job on eyebrow hair .
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I received my purchase today and used it to trim my husband's hair. He is very picky and I'm happy to report that he loved it! It was very easy to use and pretty much fool proof. I admit I watched a YouTube video first to be sure I got it right. The only so-so piece in the set are the scissors as they stick and cross over each other. I had another pair of scissors and will use them instead. All in all, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Really strong motor, great for its price. It nicks the skin though so be careful. And make sure you have rechargeable AA batteries cause they give you 1 battery but that’s it. If this is your daily user , you’ll be replacing it a lot more often because I believe it uses a lot of power for the motor it has.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FUNCTIONAL AS A TRIMMER
customer_reviews.text: REALLY AWFUL. When trimming hair you must make multiple passes in the same area. I used all of the attachments and its the same. Either the blades are very dull or the motor isnt pulling its weight. I had to trim my eyebrows for 5 minutes then just decided to use scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Got 1 for me, found it excellent to use, bought 1 for father in-law. I've tried scissors, the rotating-type nose hair trimmers, and a small needle-type hair trimmer. This is way better. Pull it out, turn it on, zip, zip, wash/dry, done. Easy, quick, effective, and painless. Has a small rigid plastic cover that snaps over the blade area. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Ford

customer_reviews.title: Powerful motor for the size.
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer has a powerful motor for the extremely compact size. The blade part of the trimmer is on the side instead of the tip like most trimmers I have tried. This makes it easier to trim as the blades cover more space and you can get them right up against the skin to clip to stubborn and hard to get hairs. I would recommend this as a good buy at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JC Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to use! The only problem I had at first was that it didn’t cut all my nose hairs but once I changed the angle of how I was moving the trimmer, everything was fixed! So find your angle and trim away! I also use it to groom my mustache and beard to a nice and even level and my girlfriend loves how it leaves it! I recommend using it if you have a short beard, and I mean short!
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: it works great. easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: i only use the nose trimmer part of this. but for that use, it works great. easy to wash, close shave, and it never yanks hairs like the rotating one i had. my biggest gripe, and it is kind of a big one, is the on off "switch" is really crappy. you rotate the silver bottom 1/4"... if you rotate it too far, the whole silver bottom comes off because it is how you remove the batteries. i would have happily spent a couple more bucks on one that had a proper switch, instead of this 2 handed operation. this might seem like nitpicking, but it really is awkward and clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: wezzz

customer_reviews.title: This thing is supposed to actually trim hair, right?
customer_reviews.text: Apparently not fully, because I had to grab scissors and trim where this trimmer absolutely just refused to. I kept rinsing and drying the blades so they were clean, but even though I could feel the device brush over the hair, it still was only getting about 85%. Not good enough. I'm considering returning it. It actually only deserves 2 stars based on performance, but I did drop it HARD on the floor and it kept ticking, so that gave it a 3rd star. Otherwise, surely there's something better out there. Philips can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good but lacks power
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Easy to clean. -Beard trimmer attachment really nice. Can use it to shave around body too. -Long battery life. Cons: -Nose and ear trimmer very weak. I have to run it along the same area 3 or 4 times to get it to shave. Unless the hair is really sticking out it doesn't work very well. I had a really cheap $6 HSN trimmer that was way more powerful for that.
customer_reviews.author: CYRUS OMAR

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month or two
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was great and did what it was supposed to do. Unfortunately, it stopped working very shortly after purchase. Changing the battery and cleaning the device did not fix anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Get it while you, best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect you can't get better for the price, It's probably the best outthere since it has so many add on for trimming, I highly recommend this one. I had a bought one different before it was more expensive then this one and it did not have all the accessories that this one has. So in short this is a bargain This is the other one that I had before and it was not better then this one and it was more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth the price you pay for it. Could work better but as I said before you get what you pay for. Has some nice attachments but have to clean everything off or it won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Bricklemeyer

customer_reviews.title: used once and it quit
customer_reviews.text: After trying and trying to contact customer service, I will take to writing a review instead. My spouse used this item once for like 10 seconds and it quit working. Even though it was brand new, we replaced the batteries and it STILL DOES NOT WORK. That's ridiculous--a waste of money and of plastic. It makes me so sad how poorly things are made these days. And, then you spend another "meager" $20 (with tax) just to throw something out...pitiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Clark-Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great nose hair trimmer with accessories!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nose hair trimmer I have tried. With most of the trimmers that I have used, I need to re-trim my nose hairs every few days. This trimmer allows me to get a much closer cut for a much cleaner look. I can go well over a week in between cuts now. The added accessories are a nice bonus too.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The Best I've Found
customer_reviews.text: After searching for the best nose hair trimmer I finally found it. It fits where it's supposed to and it trims closely. The rubber material around the blades is very comfortable on the skin. It can also be rinsed. This is the BEST nose hair trimmer out there bar none.
customer_reviews.author: Johnebgood

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cut nose hair
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this device: it is beautifully designed, washable, well weighted, good battery life, comfortable and easy to use. But it does not do a good job of cutting nose hairs. It frequently misses hairs, then really misses them as they get longer, leaving you with a few long stragglers all the time.
customer_reviews.author: SD Keating

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the blade?
customer_reviews.text: The blade is recessed to a point where it barely works. Difficult to keep contact with the skin. I had one of these that worked very well. Maybe I got a dud!
customer_reviews.author: andrew  murray

customer_reviews.title: This tool works nicely for all my fine grooming needs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, versatile, and travels well. Great for trimming my 'Stache and Burns and those pesky hairs that grow where I don't want them (nose, ears, neck etc.). Original battery still going strong nearly 2 years of biweekly use.
customer_reviews.author: jhhaight2

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really bought this as a nose-hair trimmer, which is the best feature, but I've started cleaning up the edges of my mustache and bear with the other attachment as well. Can't complain. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: JasonC

customer_reviews.title: I bought this trimmer less than six months ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trimmer less than six months ago and have used it less than a half dozen times. It stopped working and today I tried it again and when I touched it it was hot. I opened it up and the battery was also hot, I removed it. This trimmer was a total lemon!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gordon

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It wasnt something I thought I was going to buy, but i did just because, and it works better than I thought it would at the pricepoint. (It works flawlessly for what I bought it for really). The only thing some people might not like it that it uses a AA battery. I personally prefer it this way for something this small which doesn't draw too much power, it keeps it "on the go" rather than plug and charge if it died on you. Not a single negative thing to say about it. Atleast yet.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip N

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than traditional nose trimmers (the rotary kind), and its great that you can attach the end and trim eyebrows with the same tool. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Cook

customer_reviews.title: Oh wow!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to trim my ears and nostrils. This trimmer did such a quick and thorough job, way better than my Andis nose and ears trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works like it should
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace the older version of this product which lasted about 3 years before outright dying. I probably did not clean the other one enough but even still was happy it lasted as long as it did. This new version has some improvements with more attachments and a better casing. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: WillyK

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as nose trimmer. Doesn't work well for that. It is easy to clean and use but doesn't do eyebrows that easy. For me not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received it 2 days ago so I can't speak to the longevity of the product; however, my initial reactions are very favorable. Price is decent. Quality seems good. I like the eyebrow guards...easy to put on and take off. there's also a broader cutter attachment that I can use for my neck. I like that a lot. And the nose hair cutter works nicely. comes with a pouch that I can use to put everything in. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Much better than less powerful trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Used a less powerful trimmer that was AAA battery powered. This unit takes AA and works so much better. Wish I had purchased instead of the cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand what happened to Phillips norelco. Why do none of their products survive more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Shmeitan Mericker

customer_reviews.title: Is that hair coming out of your nose?
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this type of trimmer works. I prefer the cone type more. This didn't really trim much, it just scraped over the hairs. Get the other "blue" one :) I didn't know what to do with this one so I am storing it till it breaks :)
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer works! I had a rotary trimmer and threw it away - all it did was painfully pull the hairs. This trimmer cuts the hairs very closely with no pulling, no pain. Nose hairs are gone instantly. The tip is small enough to get into my ear canals to remove all those irritating hairs. Clean-up is quick and easy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: alpo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp easy to use gets job done. Girl trimmers dont cut or last like they should been having to resort to men's trimmers. Which work a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: sexylatinaloca

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last Long
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says, it doesn't last very long. I bought this in July/2018 and it is now, Feb. 2019. So it didn't even last 6 months. It wasn't used every day either, I might add. My hubby said it worked well, just didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grooming accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trimmer I’ve owned. It’s powerful and doesn’t drain battery after battery! Easy to change between attachments and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Since I have gotten older it seems as if the nose hair has gotten thicker. TMI I know. However, this item works great. Just be sure to wash it out after each use. If you don't it will stop working for you.
customer_reviews.author: cloworm

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Better for me than the other Panasonic ER430K. I have a sensitive nose and this one doesn't bother me nearly as much and seems to be quicker. As far as cleaning goes, I think it is easier. I use one for my nose and a different one for my ears to try to eliminate any cross-infection.
customer_reviews.author: admirer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: My old one quit so I thought I would try a Philips Norelco. It seems to work just fine. I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reints

customer_reviews.title: Not the good
customer_reviews.text: This item in particular you have to put too much pressure to turning on also to remove the little part where the battery goes, my came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Great product but only works for a little while saddened by this
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and a short time after the nose hair trimmer attachment stopped working. I got it exchanged end of January and today it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer
customer_reviews.text: $ stars for now. I got it here for $5 more versus Walmart's $10 one. The Amazon one has the extra attachment, well worth the $5 extra. I've used it once, seems to be a good trimmer. I no longer buy expensive ones because the blades all wear our and you're left with replacing high dollar trimmers all the time. Under $20 is my target and this one fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple of times and it does the job. It does get extra close to the skin as it says and you can get the end piece wet to clean it I just wouldn't recommend taking it in the shower or submerging it completely under water even though it says it's water proof cause it's still an electronic item and youd just be asking for it to break.
customer_reviews.author: Angelman

customer_reviews.title: not good for nose hairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different brands at the same time, both brands were of the scissor cut type.I used this one first on my nose hairs. It left a lot of hairs that the other brand cut the next day. I will keep it for the other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Urban

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one twenty years ago!
customer_reviews.text: If I had known how easy, safe, and effective this trimmer is, I would have bought it twenty years ago! Great for both ears and nose. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Makes me look trim and groomed in no time.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN B A

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is amazing for your eyebrows. Nose hairs, and detail trimming. Takes one triple A battery to run it.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Increasingly Useful Device
customer_reviews.text: This device is, regrettably, becoming more and more handy as the years roll by. That is of course no slight on the product--I'm just increasingly glad the Norelco people anticipated my needs and supplied a product that will fill them.
customer_reviews.author: HouTexan

customer_reviews.title: Great product dast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Live this trimmer. There is nothing i cant do with it. Its durable. Easy to clean and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Cory S

customer_reviews.title: Best nose hair trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Best nose hair trimmer, hands down. I've tried many over the years and this one works exactly as described. It does NOT pull hairs and cuts well. One caveat -- you MUST run the mechanism under water every single time you use it. If you do it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pfingers

customer_reviews.title: Buy a guy timmer for a great lady tammer.
customer_reviews.text: I stole this from my boyfriend years ago while on vaca. Trims without nicks like a charm. I broke the one i had and ordered a new on. Same spot on performance. The girl versions just dont deliver (spotty, no power, knicks) in the way this does so i am sticking to it.
customer_reviews.author: AtlChick

customer_reviews.title: Will it last?
customer_reviews.text: Used it sparingly over a couple years, worked well for the intended purpose but just did not last as plastic threading broke off. It still works but you have to hold the top onto the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: Generally I like it and I like what it provide, though the detailing head isn't that smooth on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Kratos

customer_reviews.title: Philips Norelco Nose
customer_reviews.text: The best product of its kind, I love the style and all the items that came with is so awesome and if that wasn't enough a nice carrying bag. Glad I made this purchase. the seller pack and shipped it for a timely delivery, great seller
customer_reviews.author: Russell Givens

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: After owning the Series 5100 for years, I wanted these attachments for it. Well now I have two units and can keep the other attachments handily on the 2nd unit. Works great when using rechargeable NiMH batteries/charger like the one I bought; Energizer Recharge Pro Charger
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Requires two hands
customer_reviews.text: I got this to do some grooming on my tiny dogs. Unfortunately, to turn it on you have to hold the bottom and twist the top. That's hard to do when trying to hold a dog who doesn't want to be groomed. Otherwise it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tpup

customer_reviews.title: The best trimmer I've owned, but lived just a year.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few trimmers, but this design is my favorite. Very slim. It seems well made and solid. It only lasted a year though and it was used infrequently. Despite this I'm thinking about ordering another to see if my luck runs better a second time.
customer_reviews.author: practical flippery

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you put the battery in "upside down"!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you put the battery in "upside down," or it won't work! I thought I had a defective unit until I discovered that trick. A Philips battery (AA) IS included. Very well made unit! Everything says quality.
customer_reviews.author: craigery

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Owned for just over 1 year- it worked well for the time that I had it. It was fairly easy to use and for the price it was fine. 13 months after purchasing it, the motor on it has failed and I’m stuck with a piece of junk now.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: You dont get the plastic cover shown in the picture. In the comparison chart is says you get 3 eyebrow trimmers, however, in the description it says you get two. Inconsistent information and false advertisement. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Normal Buyer

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had tried several grooming options and was always disappointed, but when he found these on the web he was greatly encouraged by the reviews. He has been using them for several months now, and remains a true fan. They are easy to use and very efficient. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Trims well
customer_reviews.text: I was a long time coming but I've finally gotten to the point in my life where Tarzan was swinging from ear to ear on the vines that were my nose hairs. But, no longer! This little miracle tool cleaned the nose forest right up! I highly recommend the Norelco Nose Hair Trimmer 5100 to get those the hair in your nose, sprouting from your hear holes, and underlining your forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trimmer less than 2 months ago and it has already stopped working after having been used only a handful of times for minor things. My previous trimmer was very inexpensive and lasted for years. This one definitely doesn't live up to its write ups. I would not recommend it at all. I'm sorry I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: TxAl

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. Best thing since sliced bread! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous model.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trimmer last month after my previous one (same model) I bought around 5 years ago finally stopped working. Some Issues I’ve had with my new trimmer include the nose hair trimmer attachment seemed to pull some on my neck hair, and the side burn trimmer caused some nicks and bumps on my skin. I’m glad I kept the old attachments as I’ve had no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rmjpac018

customer_reviews.title: sounds like it bogs down sometimes
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, but I feel as if it could use more power, sounds like it bogs down sometimes..... If you have fine hairs, this would work. If you have coarser hair you may want to keep looking..
customer_reviews.author: Big Lou

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco NT5175/49, Nose Hair Trimmer 5100,Washable Mens Precision Groomer for Nose, Ears, Eyebrows, Neck, and Sideburns
product_meta.description: The Philips Norelco Nose trimmer 5100 is an is an all-in-one trimmer and styler. The trimmer removes unwanted nose, ear and eyebrow hair safely and comfortably. The skin-friendly detailer and comb have rounded tips to comfortably trim your neck, sideburns, stubble and beard. The ultra-sharp Chromium steel blade avoids pulling for a more comfortable trimming experience. The unique skin-guard technology surrounds the blade and also protects against nicks and cuts. It has a non-slip grip for maximum control and comfort. The device is fully washable, simply rinse the device under faucet for easy cleaning. The Philips Norelco NoseTrimmer 5100 comes with 2 eyebrow trimming combs, 45 day money back guarantee and a full 2 year warranty. Packaging Includes: Precision trimmer, DualCut detail trimmer, Lithium AA battery, 2 eyebrow trimming combs, beard comb, pouch and cleaning brush.
feature_bullets: Easily and comfortably trim unwanted nose, ear, eyebrow, neck, sideburns, stubble and beard hair
Skin-friendly Detail trimmer and comb have rounded tips to comfortably trim your neck, sideburns, stubble and beard
The trimmer is water-resistant for easy cleaning. For long lasting performance, simply wash the trimmer under the sink after use
The built-in ProtecTube technology prevents pulls, nicks, and cuts as you trim

With Dual Cut technology, twice sharpened for sharper blades and perfect edging. Cutter width nose trimmer - 13/16 Inches. Cutter width detail trimmer - 13/16 Inches. 1 beard comb - 1/8 Inches . 2 eyebrow combs - 1/8 Inches and 3/16 Inches

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
